scripts.sass: sass -w ./css/scss/mobile/style.scss:./css/media_query/mobile/style.css -s compressed ./css/scss/mobile/menu.scss:./css/media_query/mobile/menu.css -s compressed ./css/scss/tablet/tablet.scss:./css/media_query/tablet/tablet.css -s compressed ./css/scss/desktop/desktop.scss:./css/media_query/desktop/desktop.css -s compressed ./css/loader/scss/loader.scss:./css/loader/loader.css -s compressed
